segments.text: Excuse me . Can you direct me to the toy department , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's on the 7th floor . As you get off the elevator , you'll see it on your left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you direct me to the elevator ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Go straight ahead and you'll walk into it .
segments.speaker: S2
